tool_description: Unlock the potential of QR codes with our user-friendly Flask app, QRCodeGenie. Our innovative app generates custom QR codes for any string you provide, making it easy to share information, links, and more. Businesses can use QRCodeGenie to improve customer interactions and streamline processes, while individuals can use it to share contact information with ease. With QRCodeGenie, creating and sharing QR codes has never been simpler. Try it today and experience the convenience for yourself.
title: QRCodeGenie: Your QR Code Companion
